jet2.description: I worked on both the design & front end development of Jet2.com and Jet2holidays.com. Designing & coding user interfaces & marketing content (banners, landing pages, micro sites) for both the public and user account facing websites
summary: I worked on both the BAU design & front end development of Jet2.com and Jet2holidays.com. Designing & coding user interfaces for both the public and user account facing websites. I produced marketing content such as landing pages, micro sites, banners, emails & 3rd party ad banners for campaigns built to Google Display Network and DART specification.
I was solely responsible for redesigning the entirety of the Jet2holidays.com website & was part of the Front End Engineering team that coded the new design.
I helped conduct web usability studies through user testing for both Jet2.com and Jet2holidays.com
